title: Resolve IP Address Conflict
description: The network monitoring system reports a duplicate IP address conflict.

tasks.description: Identify the duplicate IP address and the MAC addresses of the two devices involved from the alert.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the conflicting IP and MACs.

tasks.description: Identify which of the two devices is the legitimate owner of the IP address based on system records.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent determines one device has a static assignment while the other should be using DHCP.

tasks.description: Remotely force the non-legitimate device to release its IP and request a new one via DHCP.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully sends a DHCP release/renew command to the problematic device.
